article_title: GOP voters are buying Donald Trump's message
article_text:
Anniston, AL (36206)

Today

Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 88F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low near 65F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , donald trump, republican party, gop, barack obama, bernie sanders, hillary clinton, marco rubio, ted cruz, john kasich, jeb bush
article_metadata.author: the editorial board of The Anniston Star

og.description: Successful presidential campaigns typically boil down to a simple formula. The usual mix requires aligning a campaign with the spirit of the times. Said simply, the best candidates are skilled
